Key Match Events: Jos Buttler and Alex Hales posted 75 for the first wicket inside eight overs
Six wickets fell in the space of 65 deliveries for the addition of just 54
Ben Stokes scored 42 from 36 balls to secure the win
Chris Woakes hit a cut for four to confirm victory with two balls remaining
Pre-Game Insights: Australia will wonder what might have been having relinquished the opportunity to surpass Englandâ€™s net run rate
England need 142 to make it through to the semis
Sri Lanka's spinners are some of the surest on the circuit
Dawid Malan won't bat due to a hamstring injury
Malan is replaced by Chris Jordan
Post-Match Reflections: England won by four wickets (with 2 balls remaining)
Ben Stokes saw England over the line
Sam Curran's death bowler glow-up continues
England fans will be relieved to see the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pathum Nissanka started beautifully and has perhaps shown England the way here - target the smaller boundaries
Five of his seven boundaries were sixes which showed how power rather than precision works best on this surface
Dasun Shanaka says he is batting first because of a used surface at Sydney and the fact teams batting first have won the last five matches at this venue
Chamika Karunaratne comes in for Pramod Madushan in Sri Lanka
